Events that occurred on 6 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1916 - J.R.R. Tolkien leaves England for France.
1925 - Actor Gareth Jones is born.
1928 - J.R.R. Tolkien is invited to a dinner marking the completion of the Oxford English Dictionary.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Sue Parman.
1970 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 315a.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 338.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 338a.
1975 - Hugo Dyson dies.
1984 - Åke Ohlmarks, Swedish translator, dies.
2002 - At the MTV Movie Awards, Lord of the Piercing is aired.
2008 - Forodrim's 36th birthday celebration.
2023 - The Battle of Maldon: together with The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth is published in the US.

content.title: References
content.content: ↑ Wayne G. Hammond and Christina Scull (eds), The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion, p. xlx
